Name: √î MAI Vietnamees Restaurant
Review Text: Am not an expert in Vietnamese food. All I can say is I enjoyed the pho very much. A soothing broth, generous amounts of beef, chewy noodles, and fresh herbs. The perfect medicine for a cold winters evening! The service was also very friendly.

Name: √î MAI Vietnamees Restaurant

Review Text: Really tasty food. Price is fine and kind of average for europe. Nevertheless, the service could be a little bit faster and more attentive. The table was a little bit dirty and not cleaned before we were seated.

Name: √î MAI Vietnamees Restaurant
